metadataAttributes.Title: Organizational Leadership Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Successfully Lead in an Ever-Changing Business Environment. Master key strategies to successfully lead an organizational change effort in just five courses plus a final capstone project.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Design Leadership, Negotiation, Leadership, Marketing, Team Management, Collaboration, Communication, Innovation, Crisis Management, Communications Management, Advertising, Data Analysis,
